data.summary: Environment validation blocked by tooling constraints: filesystem access restricted to C:\Users\User (cannot inspect C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe), and Builder role disallows terminal commands to read COMSPEC/PATH. Both run_build_script calls failed with ENOENT: spawn C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe. Build Server script_mlcv18rg_53945746; Build Dashboard Server script_mlcw1pml_bf513089. Recommend environment remediation or implement run_build_script fallback to honor COMSPEC/PowerShell (step 18).
